actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend an Act entitled "An Act for the continuance of construction work on the San Carlos Federal irrigation project in Arizona, and for other purposes", approved June 7, 1924 (43 Stat. 475), to permit the San Carlos Indians to store water at the dam authorized to be constructed by such Act.
short_title: San Carlos Indian Water Storage Act

summary.text: San Carlos Indian Water Storage Act - Permits the San Carlos Indians to store water, for fishing and recreational purposes, at the Gila River Canyon dam which is part of the San Carlos irrigation project in Arizona.

titles.title: San Carlos Indian Water Storage Act

A bill to amend an Act entitled "An Act for the continuance of construction work on the San Carlos Federal irrigation project in Arizona, and for other purposes", approved June 7, 1924 (43 Stat. 475), to permit the San Carlos Indians to store water at the dam authorized to be constructed by such Act.
